idala idala matath mara marala kadagena watenawa.mata kisima deyak hithaganna daraganna baruwa yanawa.oluwa harunu athe gihin nathiwenna hithenawa.midiya wala porak kiyala hithagena buwek lagadi dawasaka ra thawath set ekak ekka adiyak gahanakota mara naya parak arala.uu arapu naya pare math konaka charithayak wela.sudda sinhalenma kiwwoth mamath unge patiye madhuwitha athare bayit ekak wela.mewa aruma puduma ada eeye wuna siddhi neweyi.samahara pirimi thaman mara pirimiya kiyala anith un issaraha pennanna aasayi.‚Äúmachan man arakita gahala thiyenawa‚Äú ‚Äúmachan eeki mage passen aawa‚Äú ‚Äúmachan eeki mata dunna‚Äú ‚Äúeeki man gana pissu hadila‚Äú ‚Äúmachan onna balapan man ara aluth kalla sathiyak yanna kalin alla gannawa‚Äú ‚Äúumbaata eeki dunnada?mata nam dunna‚Äú onna ohomayi samahara pirimi puduma purusha shakthiyen yuthu maha pirimi porawal wenne.
